H0.text: Who wrote the novels About A Boy, How To Be Good and High Fidelity. Jonathan Coe

H1.text: Who wrote the novels About A Boy, How To Be Good and High Fidelity. David Nicholls

H2.text: Who wrote the novels About A Boy, How To Be Good and High Fidelity. Tony Parsons

H3.text: Who wrote the novels About A Boy, How To Be Good and High Fidelity. Nick Hornby

A4.text: High Fidelity was Nick Hornby's third book and first novel, published in 1995.

A5.text: About a Boy, published in 1998, is Nick Hornby's second novel.
